title: Game-Nai Saikyou No "ura Boss" Ni Tensei Shita No De, Shujinkou No Kawarini Saisoku Clear Wo Mezashimasu!
alternative_title: Game-nai Saikyou no "Ura Boss" ni Tensei shita no de, Shujinkou no Kawarini Saisoku Clear wo Mezashimasu! ; Reincarnated as the Strongest Hidden Boss in the Game, so I'm Aiming for the Fastest Clear Instead of the Protagonist! ; ゲーム内最強の『裏ボス』に転生したので、主人公の代わりに最速クリP目指します！ ; ゲーム内最強の『裏ボス』に転生したので､主人公の代わりに最速クリアを目指します!
status: Game-nai Saikyou no "Ura Boss" ni Tensei shita no de, Shujinkou no Kawarini Saisoku Clear wo Mezashimasu! ; Reincarnated as the Strongest Hidden Boss in the Game, so I'm Aiming for the Fastest Clear Instead of the Protagonist! ; ゲーム内最強の『裏ボス』に転生したので、主人公の代わりに最速クリP目指します！ ; ゲーム内最強の『裏ボス』に転生したので､主人公の代わりに最速クリアを目指します!
description:
Description :
        "Reincarnated as the Hidden Boss!? I'm gonna end up repeating a year!"

One day, I, a degenerate gamer, found myself reincarnated as the hidden boss of the game I was grinding.

In order to return to the real world, I'm aiming for the fastest clear... but nothing goes as planned!?

Where's the protagonist of the game?! A random NPC became the hero?! And why did the villainess join my party?!

The hilarious adventure of the strongest hidden boss begins now!!
